content: When I was young, I was a bit scruffy and there were times when I didn't take a bath for up to two weeks during the summer.
translations: ita:Quando ero giovane, ero un po' trasandato e ci sono stati momenti in cui non mi sono fatto il bagno per due settimane du
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Scott (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
